title: 19 New Year's Eve Nail Ideas to Help You Start 2025 in Style
description: You might think you're all ready for New Year's Eve - hair, makeup, outfit, and shoes are set - but what about your manicure? It would be a shame not to end the year with amazing nails. To ring in 2025, and to kiss last year goodbye, it's time to pull out all the stops. Whether you're attending a glamorous dinner party with friends or watching the ball drop from your couch with takeout in hand, great New Year's eve nails are never out of place. You can go the traditional route with your New Year's Eve nail art designs and adorn your fingertips with the numbers 2025 (extra points if you do it with rhinestones) or approach the night with a more subtle vibe, like a glittery french manicure or hand-painted stars. All that matters is you find a winter nail design that suits your personal style and makes you feel like you're putting your best nails forward for the new year. Metallic nail polishes, 3D accents, and eye-catching glitter lacquer all make for great New Year's nail designs. There's nothing like a fun and bubbly manicure to really get you into the celebratory spirit. Whether you plan to DIY your look or visit a salon, ahead, find New Year's Eve nail designs to help you welcome 2025 when the clock strikes midnight on Dec. 31. Keep scrolling for the best New Year nail art ideas to save.
author: Jessica Harrington
excerpt: These are the best New Year nail art ideas to celebrate the start of 2025. Get inspired with endless New Year's Eve nail art designs.
text: You might think you're all ready for New Year's Eve — hair, makeup, outfit, and shoes are set — but what about your manicure? It would be a shame not to end the year with amazing nails. To ring in 2025, and to kiss last year goodbye, it's time to pull out all the stops. Whether you're attending a glamorous dinner party with friends or watching the ball drop from your couch with takeout in hand, great New Year's eve nails are never out of place. You can go the traditional route with your New Year's Eve nail art designs and adorn your fingertips with the numbers 2025 (extra points if you do it with rhinestones) or approach the night with a more subtle vibe, like a glittery french manicure or hand-painted stars. All that matters is you find a winter nail design that suits your personal style and makes you feel like you're putting your best nails forward for the new year. Metallic nail polishes, 3D accents, and eye-catching glitter lacquer all make for great New Year's nail designs. There's nothing like a fun and bubbly manicure to really get you into the celebratory spirit. Whether you plan to DIY your look or visit a salon, ahead, find New Year's Eve nail designs to help you welcome 2025 when the clock strikes midnight on Dec. 31. Keep scrolling for the best New Year nail art ideas to save.Confetti New Year's Eve NailsIt's party time! This New Year's Eve nail art idea features various colored stars and glitter resembling confetti. Firework New Year's Eve NailsBring the festive celebration to your fingertips with a firework-themed set. The black base polish resembles the night sky, with multicolored explosions happening on each nail. Simple New Year's Eve NailsIf you're not big on over-the-top nail art, this bared-back set is for you. Each nail is painted in a light pink base color with gold and silver vertical lines. It's festive and sparkly, but not too bold. Rainbow Bubbly New Year's Eve NailsThis manicure has everything: a rainbow of colors, confetti, bubbly, fireworks, and the year. Yet, it's still simple thanks to the negative space design and nude base color. Double French New Year's Eve NailsTake your french manicure up a notch and make it a double with glitter. These make for one of the cutest New Year's Eve nail designs. Pearl Accented New Year's Eve NailsPearl accents have been everywhere this year, and they're one of our favorite New Year's nail ideas. Glitter Ombré New Year's Eve NailsNothing says New Year's Eve nails quite like glitter, and we love this pared-down look with ombré for short nails. Glitter Star New Year's EveCelebrate the new year in style with a simple yet festive manicure. You'll want to wear this glitter star design long after the clock strikes midnight. Gold Leaf New Year's Eve NailsMetallics scream New Year's nails, and we love this elegant set featuring gold leaf over a glossy black base. New Year's Eve Glittery French ManicureNot into the double french manicure? No worries. A classic french looks perfect with the addition of some glitter, like these nails with gold accents. Silver Star New Year's Eve NailsGo bold with your New Year's nails and add fun star detailing outlined in black. Gold Star New Year's Eve NailsIf you want a manicure that won't go out of style after the ball drops, we suggest going for something simple but still on theme, like these gold stars.Black-and-White French New Year's Eve NailsNew Year's nails don't have to be metallic or sparkly. These black-and-white french tips are still on theme, but the color scheme is a little more simplistic. Mismatched New Year's Eve NailsIf you can't decide which way to go with your New Year's nails, why not pick a different design for each finger? Snowflakes and glitter look perfect paired together.Negative Space Star New Year's Eve NailsNegative space nail art is always on trend, but if you want the perfect New Year's Eve nails, pair it with star designs and glitter.Festive Metallic New Year's Eve NailsLooking for bright New Year's Eve nail ideas? We're obsessed with this almond-shaped manicure that features a fun metallic design. Snow-Themed New Year's Eve NailsWhether it snows where you live for the new year or you just wish it did, we love New Year's Eve nail designs that feature snowy elements, like this manicure. The design includes blue french tips, snowflakes, and presents.Dainty Number New Year's Eve NailsHow cute are these New Year's nails that feature the year in tiny, dainty letters? Classic French New Year's Eve NailsIf you want to take your classic french manicure to the next level, we love the idea of adding simple, dainty star nail art, like this manicure. Jessica Harrington (she/her) is the senior editor of PS Beauty, where she oversees coverage around makeup, skin care, hair, tattoos, and more. html:
You might think you're all ready for New Year's Eve — hair, makeup, outfit, and shoes are set — but what about your manicure? It would be a shame not to end the year with amazing nails. To ring in 2025, and to kiss last year goodbye, it's time to pull out all the stops. Whether you're attending a glamorous dinner party with friends or watching the ball drop from your couch with takeout in hand, great New Year's eve nails are never out of place.

You can go the traditional route with your New Year's Eve nail art designs and adorn your fingertips with the numbers 2025 (extra points if you do it with rhinestones) or approach the night with a more subtle vibe, like a glittery french manicure or hand-painted stars. All that matters is you find a winter nail design that suits your personal style and makes you feel like you're putting your best nails forward for the new year.

Metallic nail polishes, 3D accents, and eye-catching glitter lacquer all make for great New Year's nail designs. There's nothing like a fun and bubbly manicure to really get you into the celebratory spirit. Whether you plan to DIY your look or visit a salon, ahead, find New Year's Eve nail designs to help you welcome 2025 when the clock strikes midnight on Dec. 31.

Keep scrolling for the best New Year nail art ideas to save.

Confetti New Year's Eve Nails

It's party time! This New Year's Eve nail art idea features various colored stars and glitter resembling confetti.

Firework New Year's Eve Nails

Bring the festive celebration to your fingertips with a firework-themed set. The black base polish resembles the night sky, with multicolored explosions happening on each nail.

Simple New Year's Eve Nails

If you're not big on over-the-top nail art, this bared-back set is for you. Each nail is painted in a light pink base color with gold and silver vertical lines. It's festive and sparkly, but not too bold.

Rainbow Bubbly New Year's Eve Nails

This manicure has everything: a rainbow of colors, confetti, bubbly, fireworks, and the year. Yet, it's still simple thanks to the negative space design and nude base color.

Double French New Year's Eve Nails

Take your french manicure up a notch and make it a double with glitter. These make for one of the cutest New Year's Eve nail designs.

Pearl Accented New Year's Eve Nails

Pearl accents have been everywhere this year, and they're one of our favorite New Year's nail ideas.

Glitter Ombré New Year's Eve Nails

Nothing says New Year's Eve nails quite like glitter, and we love this pared-down look with ombré for short nails.

Glitter Star New Year's Eve

Celebrate the new year in style with a simple yet festive manicure. You'll want to wear this glitter star design long after the clock strikes midnight.

Gold Leaf New Year's Eve Nails

Metallics scream New Year's nails, and we love this elegant set featuring gold leaf over a glossy black base.

New Year's Eve Glittery French Manicure

Not into the double french manicure? No worries. A classic french looks perfect with the addition of some glitter, like these nails with gold accents.

Silver Star New Year's Eve Nails

Go bold with your New Year's nails and add fun star detailing outlined in black.

Gold Star New Year's Eve Nails

If you want a manicure that won't go out of style after the ball drops, we suggest going for something simple but still on theme, like these gold stars.

Black-and-White French New Year's Eve Nails

New Year's nails don't have to be metallic or sparkly. These black-and-white french tips are still on theme, but the color scheme is a little more simplistic.

Mismatched New Year's Eve Nails

If you can't decide which way to go with your New Year's nails, why not pick a different design for each finger? Snowflakes and glitter look perfect paired together.

Negative Space Star New Year's Eve Nails

Negative space nail art is always on trend, but if you want the perfect New Year's Eve nails, pair it with star designs and glitter.

Festive Metallic New Year's Eve Nails

Looking for bright New Year's Eve nail ideas? We're obsessed with this almond-shaped manicure that features a fun metallic design.

Snow-Themed New Year's Eve Nails

Whether it snows where you live for the new year or you just wish it did, we love New Year's Eve nail designs that feature snowy elements, like this manicure. The design includes blue french tips, snowflakes, and presents.

Dainty Number New Year's Eve Nails

How cute are these New Year's nails that feature the year in tiny, dainty letters?

Classic French New Year's Eve Nails

If you want to take your classic french manicure to the next level, we love the idea of adding simple, dainty star nail art, like this manicure.

Jessica Harrington (she/her) is the senior editor of PS Beauty, where she oversees coverage around makeup, skin care, hair, tattoos, and more. With more than eight years of industry experience, she has interviewed countless celebrities, reported on hundreds of beauty trends, and swatched more lipsticks than she can count. Prior to PS, Jessica worked for publications such as Makeup.com, Skincare.com, and The Zoe Report.
